code: import _objectSpread from"/Users/deri/Documents/Github/demo-observability-dotnet/react/node_modules/babel-preset-react-app/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2";/*global Sentry*/import*as actionTypes from'../actions/actionTypes';var initialState={cart:[]};var buyItem=function buyItem(state,action){var cart=[].concat(state.cart);cart.push(action.item);Sentry.configureScope(function(scope){scope.setExtra('cart',JSON.stringify(cart));});Sentry.addBreadcrumb({category:'cart',message:'User added '+action.item.name+' to cart',level:'info'});return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{cart:cart});};var resetCart=function resetCart(state,action){Sentry.configureScope(function(scope){scope.setExtra('cart','');});Sentry.addBreadcrumb({category:'cart',message:'User emptied cart',level:'info'});return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{cart:[]});};var reducer=function reducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case actionTypes.BUY_ITEM:return buyItem(state,action);case actionTypes.RESET_CART:return resetCart(state,action);default:return state;}};export default reducer;
